Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory29.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: '(Forces his way through dozens of guards himself) Aah...!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'That is the Construct... We cannot have him here...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The guards all leap toward Kamui one after another...'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The ground cracks open, and the guards drag Kamui into the rift...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nat', 3: 'I will take my time with him once I am done with Gray Raven. His frame is... interesting.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: '(Defeats the last guard) ...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I was careless... I've gotta find a way back. They can't win without me!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'The Punishing Virus concentration in the air is... rising?!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory40.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Enable'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: 'This way, the Punishing Virus will soon corrupt the power system completely.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "The Ascendants' will take down this Golden Vortex...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Yada yada, what have you done this time?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: "(Roland dodges Kamui's strike) ...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "(Lifts his weapon) Looks like you've fully recovered.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Roland', 3: '(Quietly moves away) Well... I couldn\'t have done it with your "assistance," Babylonian.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Roland', 3: "Who would've thought that there would come a day when we join forces...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'What the hell are you talking about...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Roland turns and hides within a few massive shadowy figures. Multiple elite Corrupted strike at Kamui.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Getting help again...? Your tricks are getting old.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Roland cuts through the metal wall and leaves Kamui behind with the elite Corrupted.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The special equipment from Strike Hawk has detected that the Punishing Virus is destroying the power supply.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "I knew Roland was up to no good sneaking around here... It's broken...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'If the power supply is infected, the engine will soon overclock... Knowing what the Punishing Virus can do, the Golden Vortex is not going to last.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Gray Raven is still up there...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "(Blocks an elite Corrupted's shot) ...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I have to enter a system channel to delay the Punishing Virus infection... but I can't just leave these Corrupted alone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I guess it's time for a dual monitor setup.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "Isolate my M.I.N.D. while transmitting the frame's visual input to it.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Kamui', 3: "That way, I can keep controlling my frame to fight while I hack into the power supply. It's like logging into two accounts for an MMO at the same time! Piece of cake for a pro gamer like me.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Beginning to hack into the power supply...', 4: '1'}
